statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{11 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 10 \, x + 7 , -5 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 2 , -3 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 2 , -6 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 6 \, x - 5 , 19 \, x^{3} - 9 \, x^{2} + 20 \, x + 18\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
